name: sandBoxWindows
short_description:
This project was born in my college from a challenge I had to face, It was, to find a simple way to hide the execution of a process on Windows meanwhile some keyloggers were running so the entered data keep safe.
This is a pragmatic way to face the requirement because of the fact that many Anti-virus works on a base of black lists. With this in mind, I found a simple way to bypass the treats and get rid off any anti-virus to keep my information safe meanwhile I am doing online transactions.
summary: the project is intended as an end-point security solution
